mapper.insert: insert into business (BUSINESS_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, LINK_MAIN_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_TYPE_ID, STATUS, BUSINESS_SOURCE_ID, PERSALE_PRICE, PROBABILITY, VISIT_TIME, VISIT_CONTENT, UPDATE_TIME, EMPLOYEE_ID) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkMainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{persalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update business
BUSINESS_ID = #{record.businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LINK_MAIN_ID = #{record.linkMainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUSINESS_NAME = #{record.businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TYPE_ID = #{record.businessTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_SOURCE_ID = #{record.businessSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PERSALE_PRICE = #{record.persalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROBABILITY = #{record.probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VISIT_TIME = #{record.visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VISIT_CONTENT = #{record.visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{record.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update business set BUSINESS_ID = #{record.businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LINK_MAIN_ID = #{record.linkMainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_NAME = #{record.businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_TYPE_ID = #{record.businessTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_SOURCE_ID = #{record.businessSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PERSALE_PRICE = #{record.persalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROBABILITY = #{record.probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VISIT_TIME = #{record.visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VISIT_CONTENT = #{record.visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{record.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update business
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LINK_MAIN_ID = #{linkMainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TYPE_ID = #{businessTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_SOURCE_ID = #{businessSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PERSALE_PRICE = #{persalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROBABILITY = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VISIT_TIME = #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VISIT_CONTENT = #{visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update business set CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LINK_MAIN_ID = #{linkMainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_TYPE_ID = #{businessTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_SOURCE_ID = #{businessSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PERSALE_PRICE = #{persalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROBABILITY = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VISIT_TIME = #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VISIT_CONTENT = #{visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
